summary: This is a calendar entry for a meeting titled 'Epstein Op Meeting with FBI' scheduled for July 1, 2019, from 19:30 to 20:30 UTC. The entry was created and modified on June 27, 2019, by an organizer from USANYS (likely U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York). It includes an alarm reminder and lists an attendee from the same office.

events.title: Epstein Op Meeting with FBI
events.description: A scheduled meeting concerning an operation related to Jeffrey Epstein, organized by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).

keyFacts: A meeting titled 'Epstein Op Meeting with FBI' was scheduled for July 1, 2019, indicating active investigation or operational planning by federal authorities shortly before Epstein's arrest.
The meeting was organized by USANYS, the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, which was leading the prosecution.
The calendar entry was created on June 27, 2019, showing planning occurred days before the meeting.
The document is a calendar entry with an alarm reminder, suggesting it was an important, scheduled event for the involved personnel.
No specific individuals are named in the provided text; all references are to the office (USANYS).
